
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(module-bdev-nvme)
target_compile_options(module-bdev-nvme PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(module-bdev-nvme PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
)
target_link_libraries(module-bdev-nvme PUBLIC
  spdk-lib-accel
  spdk-lib-bdev
  spdk-lib-json
  spdk-lib-jsonrpc
  spdk-lib-log
  spdk-lib-nvme
  spdk-lib-rpc
  spdk-lib-thread
  spdk-lib-util
)
target_sources(module-bdev-nvme PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/nvme/common.c
)

add_global_library_for(module-bdev-nvme.global module-bdev-nvme)
target_compile_options(module-bdev-nvme.global PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(module-bdev-nvme.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
)
target_link_libraries(module-bdev-nvme.global PUBLIC
  spdk-lib-accel
  spdk-lib-bdev
  spdk-lib-json
  spdk-lib-jsonrpc
  spdk-lib-log
  spdk-lib-nvme
  spdk-lib-rpc
  spdk-lib-thread
  spdk-lib-util
)
target_sources(module-bdev-nvme.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/nvme/bdev_nvme.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/nvme/bdev_nvme_rpc.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/nvme/bdev_ocssd.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/nvme/bdev_ocssd_rpc.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/nvme/nvme_rpc.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/nvme/vbdev_opal.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/nvme/vbdev_opal_rpc.c
)
